StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Beyond the <clr:0000>Bridge of Hylia<clr:ffff>, you'll find
<clr:0000>Faron<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>a densely wooded region with lots
of old ruins.
It has no shortage of hiding places,
which means the <clr:0000>Yiga Clan<clr:ffff> can easily
conceal themselves there.
That's the reason I'm on high alert.
Sorry for suspecting you.

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>Did you know some of their members even
camouflage in trees? The cowards!

If you spot a tree with even one leaf
out of place, stay away. You got that?
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>The <clr:0000>Yiga Clan<clr:ffff> are not showing
themselves. Perhaps they know better
than to try confronting me.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble_00>But wait... <sp:5:0:0>No!<sp:5:0:0> How could I forget their
mastery in the evil arts of disguise
and camouflage?
For all I know, they may be hiding in
plain sight, slipping in among crowds
of innocent travelers...
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_01>Sa'oten! I must be ever watchful, lest one
of those tricksters tries to slit my throat!
StartPoint_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>Hmm.


I have seen the Yiga Clan use disguises in
the past, and I am experienced enough to
tell you're not a member of that group.
BeforeMeetPurah_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>If you've lost your way, I suggest going
<clr:0000>north<clr:ffff> to <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>.

You can find your way there by using
<clr:0000>Hyrule Castle <clr:ffff>as a landmark.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>You picked the perfect moment to jump in.<sp:5:0:0>
I hardly had to work at all.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>The way you fight... <sp:5:0:0>Incredible. <sp:5:0:0>You're not
that famous swordsman, are you?
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>I hear that some members of the <clr:0000>Yiga Clan<clr:ffff>
can camouflage amid <clr:0000>fruit<clr:ffff>.

<snd:Greeting>Should you come across a fruit that
seems suspicious, be on guard.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_01>I fear the <clr:0000>Yiga Clan <clr:ffff>are hiding in plain
sight, slipping in among innocent
passersby to evade detection.
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>This means I can trust no one I meet...
Even a kind, wrinkly old vai may in fact
be a Yiga assassin in disguise.
I hate to cast undue suspicion on
innocents, but that may simply be
the cost of vigilance.
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Sarqso! <sp:5:0:0>I was backed into a corner before
you arrived!
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>There's a rumor that the <clr:0000>chasms<clr:ffff>
everywhere have become hiding
places for the <clr:0000>Yiga Clan<clr:ffff>.
If you ever go near a <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>, be sure to
stay on your guard.
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Sarqso!<sp:5:0:0> Please don't judge my combat
skills on this fight alone.

If I had my usual trusty blade, I would
have won this by now!
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Apparently some members of the
<clr:0000>Yiga Clan <clr:ffff>can camouflage in trees.

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>If any foliage strikes you as suspicious,
I advise you stay away from it.
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Sa'oten!<sp:5:1:0> I'd better go... I know better
than to take on hopeless battles!
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_00>Ugh...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0201>A proud Gerudo soldier, losing to the likes
of them... <sp:5:0:0>Humiliating!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Phew. If you weren't here, I likely would
have perished in that fight.

<sp:3:0:2:0301>I wish I had my usual gear with me.
Then I'd have had no trouble, even
fighting on my own.
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_01>Ugh... <sp:5:0:0>I am on a mission!<sp:5:1:0> And I won't be
cut down before it is complete!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Well, then!<sp:5:0:0> A show of gratitude is in order.<sp:5:0:0>
Will you take this?
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad_01>I shouldn't have had so much trouble
with an enemy like that... <sp:5:1:0>Ha!<sp:5:0:0> I suppose
I'm getting old!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>You seem at home in battle... <sp:5:1:0>You're not
in the <clr:0000>Yiga Clan<clr:ffff>, are you?

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Ha! What am I saying? <sp:5:0:0>As if those fiends
would go to the trouble of saving me!
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>Hiding out in <clr:0000>chasms <clr:ffff>where no one is
looking—where sunlight doesn't reach—
would be exactly the <clr:0000>Yiga Clan<clr:ffff>'s style.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Sadly, we have too little information to
know whether the suspicious figures seen
in the <clr:0000>chasms <clr:ffff>are Yiga.
For now, we will have to wait and keep
a watchful eye.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>I appreciate your help. <sp:5:0:0>I will try to be
more careful.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The <clr:0000>Bridge of Hylia<clr:ffff> is to the <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff>, and
beyond it, densely wooded <clr:0000>Faron<clr:ffff>.

That region was already ideal for <clr:0000>Yiga
Clan <clr:ffff>members seeking places to hide.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble_00>But now, to make the situation there
even worse, I hear that they have started
to disguise themselves as <clr:0000>fruit<clr:ffff>.
The forest has <clr:0000>fruit <clr:ffff>everywhere, of
course, so it's bound to be crawling
with Yiga jackals!
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>If you come across a suspicious <clr:0000>fruit<clr:ffff>,
be on guard. <sp:5:0:0>It could be a trap.
First:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>Hm...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>You appear to be a normal traveler.<sp:5:0:0>
Forgive my impolite stare.

I am a <clr:0000>Gerudo soldier<clr:ffff> on a mission to
hunt down the <clr:0000>Yiga Clan<clr:ffff>.

The Yiga, if you are lucky enough not to
have met them, are rascals who like to
accost travelers on the roads.
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>And as if that wasn't enough, they are
also masters of disguise!

The fiends masquerade as ordinary
travelers and then, when your guard
is down, they strike!
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Wherever your journey takes you, keep a
weather eye out for the <clr:0000>Yiga Clan<clr:ffff>!
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>It seldom rained in <clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>, so
sheltering from the rain like this still
feels novel and exciting.
I could stay here for ages, listening to
that pitter-patter and never tire of it.

Even after the rain stops, I might never
move from this spot...
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I heard a rumor that members of the
<clr:0000>Yiga Clan<clr:ffff> are hiding out in the <clr:0000>chasms<clr:ffff>
that appeared everywhere.
Without any evidence, I hesitate to
believe such a fantastic claim, but I
can't dismiss it either.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>The question is, why would they choose
to roost in those dank, unlivable places?
Literal holes in the ground?
Perhaps... <sp:5:0:0>Perhaps because no one would
think to look for them there.

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>And in the <clr:0000>chasms<clr:ffff>, there would be plenty
of shadows for the cowards to hide in.
BeforeMeetPurah_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>You look troubled. <sp:5:0:0>Have you, by chance,
lost your way?

If so, then I suggest you try going north
to <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>The place is abundant with people and
with knowledge. <sp:5:0:0>Perhaps someone there
can guide you.
<clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff> is near <clr:0000>Hyrule Castle<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
You can find your way there by using the
castle as a landmark.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It hardly ever rains in <clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>, the
place where I was born and raised.

So I admit, sheltering from the rain like
this still feels novel and exciting.

<sp:3:0:2:0501>On a journey, one can have truly new
experiences... <sp:5:0:0>You have to slow down
and enjoy them when they happen.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>They are like oases in the desert, these
moments of simple pleasure.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>I hear that members of the <clr:0000>Yiga Clan <clr:ffff>have
been camouflaging amid <clr:0000>fruit<clr:ffff>.

<snd:Greeting>Take caution, especially if you travel
through the <clr:0000>dense forest <clr:ffff>nearby.
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The <clr:0000>Bridge of Hylia <clr:ffff>lies to the south,
and beyond it, <clr:0000>Faron<clr:ffff>.

That region is well known for its densely
wooded forests.

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Trouble_00>Lately, though, there have been
troubling reports of <clr:0000>Yiga Clan <clr:ffff>members
camouflaging amid the <clr:0000>fruit<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Stay on your guard...or one of their
assassins may catch you unawares.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>I heard a rumor that members of the
<clr:0000>Yiga Clan<clr:ffff> are hiding out in <clr:0000>chasms<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Trouble_00>While I hesitate to believe the claim
without definite proof, I can't dismiss it
outright either.
Please, exercise caution around
the <clr:0000>chasms<clr:ffff>.
